subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: Vikings running back Adrian Peterson, who has rushed for 409 yards against Green Bay this season, will visit Lambeau Field on Saturday night in the wild-card round of the N.F.C. playoffs.
snippet: Vikings running back Adrian Peterson, who has rushed for 409 yards against Green Bay this season, will visit Lambeau Field on Saturday night in the wild-card round of the N.F.C. playoffs.
